name: 40 Days Of Winter
description:
Quick game made for the Chill Jam.

You've gotten stranded somewhere, in complete winter darkness. Only once the light comes back on and the snowstorm calms down will you be able to be rescued.

Quick Tutorial: Hit a tree and burn the stick to make a torch. On everything else, good luck.

Asset Pack: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
